patthana15.1:2.1_0: Hetuṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ
patthana15.1:2.1_1: kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuṁ kusalañca
patthana15.1:2.1_2: nahetuṁ kusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …
patthana15.1:3.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.1:5.1: Hetu kusalo dhammo nahetussa nakusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana15.1:6.1: Hetu kusalo dhammo nahetussa nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana15.1:7.1: Nahetu kusalo dhammo nanahetussa nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana15.1:8.1: Hetu kusalo ca nahetu kusalo ca dhammā nahetussa nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana15.1:9.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare samanantare nava, sahajāte
patthana15.1:9.1_1: nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye nava, pacchājāte tīṇi, kamme ekaṁ, āhāre ekaṁ, indriye tīṇi,
patthana15.1:9.1_2: jhāne ekaṁ, magge tīṇi, vippayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṁ.)
patthana15.1:10.1: Hetuṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.1:11.1: Nahetuṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.1:12.1: Hetuṁ akusalañca nahetuṁ akusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.1:14.1: Hetu akusalo dhammo nahetussa naakusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana15.1:15.1: Hetu akusalo dhammo nahetussa naakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana15.1:16.1: Nahetu akusalo dhammo nanahetussa naakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana15.1:17.1: Hetu akusalo ca nahetu akusalo ca dhammā nahetussa naakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana15.1:18.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā ekaṁ, anantare samanantare nava, sahajāte
patthana15.1:18.1_1: nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye nava, pacchājāte tīṇi, kamme ekaṁ, āhāre ekaṁ, indriye tīṇi,
patthana15.1:18.1_2: jhāne ekaṁ, magge tīṇi, vippayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.1:19.1: Nahetuṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Nissayavārampi …pe… pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṁ.)
